test suite
: A collection of tests which are run together to generate model documentation end-to-end for specific use-cases. 

For example, the [`classifier_full_suite`](../../validmind/validmind/test_suites/classifier.html#ClassifierFullSuite) test suite runs tests from the [`tabular_dataset`](../../validmind/validmind/test_suites/tabular_datasets.html) and [`classifier`](../../validmind/validmind/test_suites/classifier.html) test suites to fully document the data and model sections for binary classification model use-cases.
